extendedInfo.description: Buy Online Tickets. Movie Tickets Booking. Book T20 Tickets, T20 Cricket, Music Concerts, Sports, Plays, Events, Theater, Cinema & Match Tickets. Cricket Schedule, Match Reviews, Movie Reviews, T20 Match News.With BookMyShow's application you can now book tickets for movies, plays, concerts and many other events happening in your city.Most of the renowned cinemas in the country like PVR Cinemas, BIG Cinemas, INOX, AGS Cinemas, Apna Cinema, CineMAX, City Gold, DT City Centre, E-SQUARE, Cinepolis, Fame Cinemas, Fun Cinemas, Glitz Cinemas, Gold Cinema, Gopalan Cinemas, HDIL Broadway, INOX, Movietime, Prasads, Q Cinemas, Rajhans Cine World, Satyam Cineplexes, SRS Cinemas, Storm 5D, Wave and many more have tied-up exclusively with BookMyShow.If that's not enough, you can also book tickets for theaters like NCPA Mumbai, Prithvi Theatre Mumbai, Epicenter Gurgaon, Yours Truly Alma Banglore, Ranga Shankara, Jagriti Theatre, Lamakaan Hyderabad, Comedy Store, Alliance Francaise Chennai, Alliance Francaise Delhi and many more.BookMyShow's application is definitely your one-stop shop for all your ticketing and entertainment needs. Reviews, Tamil movie tickets, Telugu movie tickets, play tickets, comedy shows, T20 tickets, music concert tickets and more - You want it, we got it!Download our app for FREE and book tickets on the go. The box office at your fingertips.Like us on Facebook:- http://www.facebook.com/BookMyShowINFollow us on Twitter:- https://twitter.com/BookMyShow

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: An excellent app to book movies... Good bye to browsing for theater websites and walk to theater to book....  Simple and easy and very reliable... Excellent job!!!!!
reviews.author: ramesh prabhu

reviews.comment: Cannot book tickets with icici offer though discount is calculated. Always.gives error. Pls fix.
reviews.author: Amol Date

reviews.title: Cool app!!!!!
reviews.comment: Nice app to work..but please in sports you put cricket option so that we can book cricket tickets easily....everything is good...no complaints wrt site
reviews.author: Venu Kamanth

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: I have used it always for my movie tickets booking, awsome results. Need to improve the payment gateway as it hangs some times
reviews.author: Ganesh Kamath

reviews.title: Not helping purpose
reviews.comment: App is good. Has all info n its good if u want to direct book ticket... but if you want to apply ongoing card offer... it wiped out once u reach on offer page.... hope BMS team will listen this from this forum...
reviews.author: srikant chaturvedi

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: No need to fight we the ticket counters for choosing our own sea
reviews.author: Shubham Shah

reviews.title: Okay..can be better
reviews.comment: Need an option to book and pay later..kindly put that..
reviews.author: Prashant N

reviews.title: Should provide the feedback of movies option
reviews.comment: Excellent app. But i think it must also provide options to rate movies, see ratings and reviews
reviews.author: Akshay Waghmare

reviews.comment: It was fun having such amzing type of apps :)
reviews.author: aman jain

reviews.title: It is a good app for booking tickets...
reviews.comment: Excellent Job
reviews.author: Dr Frat

reviews.title: Works well, but ugly ui and icon
reviews.comment: This app works really well, but what an ugly icon and user interface to go with. Its like a blister on my app drawer!!! Kindly make high res icon and ui and I shall rate 5 stars. Give the users a premium visual experience just like your service!
reviews.author: Sanchit Kumar

reviews.title: Confusing booking page
reviews.comment: See very carefully when you select seats as its confusing. You may select front row when wanting to select last row. I made that mistake, hot pain in the neck for 2 days, had to leave movie in middle. Best is to use it to check show timing.
reviews.author: Ashish Sharma

reviews.title: Crashes a lot...
reviews.comment: The app almost always crashes while payment; which makes it a big risk for booking tickets...
reviews.author: Rajeev Rai

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: So easy to book a movie  ticket

reviews.title: Charges
reviews.comment: App is good... But for booking ticket extra charges are too much.... Please try to fix this.....

reviews.title: It\'s only good because there\'s nobody else
reviews.comment: When is it going to upgrade to the Holo theme? It\'s about time now...

reviews.title: Good for checking showtime only
reviews.comment: Ticket booking is out of question. Extra charges are too much.
